title: Task handling
description: Implement all features that allow proper handling of tasks. docs/tasks/task_format.py is the source of truth for the interfaces for a Task, Feature, ProjectSpec & ProjectRequirement. docs/tasks/task_example.json holds an example task json file.

features.title: Task schema definition
features.description: Generate TypeScript interfaces from the schema into `src/types/tasks.ts`

features.title: Logical Tasks indexer and file watcher
features.description: Scan tasks/{id}/ directories under the selected project root to build an in-memory index of tasks and features. Implement a file watcher to refresh the index on changes (create/modify/delete). Acceptance: Indexing handles 100+ tasks; watcher reliably updates on file changes; performance measured and documented;.

features.title: Tasks list UI with filtering and search - view only
features.description: Build a React view listing tasks with id, title, status, and counts of features (done/total). Provide text search and filters (e.g., status). Filtering/search applied client-side; empty states handled; accessibility basics (labels, keyboard nav) covered.

features.title: Task details view with feature list - view only
features.description: Create a detail page showing the task metadata and its features with statuses.

features.title: Edit mode - feature details
features.description: Allow editing of a feature's parameters. The status dropdown defaults to the current status. The string list edits show rows of editable strings. Dependencies allow matching features by name and working out the id from it.

features.title: Create mode - new feature
features.description: Allow adding a new feature to a task in a new popup window - make this the same pattern as edit mode.

features.title: Edit mode - task details
features.description: Allow editing of a task's title and description.

features.title: Create mode - new task
features.description: Allow adding a new task in a new popup window - make this the same pattern as task edit mode and create feature.

features.title: Common functions and libraries
features.description: We need to have common components for popups, alerts, toasts etc. Especially the create/edit feature and create/edit task popups should stem from a common popup component.

features.title: Use shadcn and tailwind
features.description: For any reusable UI components we should use`shadcn` and tailwind styling. As a first showcase of this, we need a settings screen where it must be possible to change themes.

features.title: Edit mode - moving features around
features.description: Allow editing the order of features for a task - thus changing the underlying id everywhere where it's referenced.

features.title: Edit mode - moving tasks around
features.description: Allow editing the order of tasks - thus changing the underlying id everywhere where it's referenced.

features.title: Delete mode - delete feature
features.description: Allow deleting a feature from a task.
